short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 2016 Chrome Extension. Allows Zooming, clipboard delegate for the ckeditor, and take screenshots of the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Perform browser Zoom via javascript.
Paste contents of the clipboard into text area via javascript.
Takes a screenshot of the current tab when required.
Native Messaging capability added.
